name: Mirrorweald
description:
Click to dash towards your mouse. 

Get the keys to open doors, avoid traps, and get to the portals !

This game was made during the Mini-Jam 121 by  :

Stevo (2D assets, 2D animations)

BAUM (Sound design)

Lucas Rioust (Dev, Game Design, Level Design)

Matthis Pillonel (Dev, Game Design, UI)
